mapper.select: select pac.loyaltyexpirationdate__c as cnhExpirationDate , pac.row_id as contactId , pac.firstname as firstName , pac.lastname as lastName , pac.personbirthdate as birthDate , pac.gender__pc as gender , pac.personhomephone as homePhone , pac.companyphone__pc as workPhone , pac.personmobilephone as cellPhone , pac.personemail as emailAddress , pac.amount_friends as amountFriends , pac.amount_children as amountChildren , pac.optinflag__c as loyaltyOPTINFla , pac.loyaltyactivationdate__c as loyaltyActivationDate , pac.loyaltyexpirationtodate__c as loyaltyExpirationDate , pac.loyaltyengagementindex__c as loyaltyEngagementIndex , pac.satisficationlevel__c as loyaltySatisfactionLevel , pac.loyaltylifecycle__c as loyaltyLifeCycle , pac.crmindex__c as loyaltyCRMIndex , pac.satisficationlevel__c as loyaltyTierLevel , pac.loyaltystatus__c as loyaltyStatus , pac.billingstreet as streetAddress , pac.billingstreet_2__c as streetAddress2 , pac.billingstreet_3__c as streetAddress3 , pac.billingcountry as county , pac.billingcity as city , pac.billingstate as state , pac.billingpostalcode as postalCode , pac.numeric_row_id as numericRowId , pac.emailoptyn__pc as suppressAllEmails , pac.blockedsms__c as suppressAllSMS , pac.x_printed_card__c as printedCard from process.account pac where pac.row_id = #{contactId}

select pas.row_id as vehicleId , pcvp.relation_type_cd as relationship , pas.renavam_code__c as hmbRenavamCode , pas.latestmileage__c as currenMileage , pas.carregistrationnumber__c as vehicleLicenseNumber , pas.serialnumber as serialNumber , pas.name as fscOcn , pas.manufacturedate as manufactureYear , pas.modelname__c as model , pas.modelyear__c as modelYear , pas.vehicleinternalcolor__c as internalColorCode , pas.vehiclecolor__c as externalColorCode , pas.hexawarrantyflag__c as hexaWarrantyFlag , pas.account_row_id__c as dealerId , pcvp.retail_date as retailDt , (select corporaterepresentativename__c from process.account where row_id = account_row_id__c) as salesRepId , (select lastname from process.account where row_id = contact_row_id__c) as salesRepLastName , (select firstname from process.account where row_id = contact_row_id__c) as salesReFirstName , pci.val as operatingStatus from process.asset pas join process.customer_vehicle pcvp on pas.row_id = pcvp.asset_id and pcvp.cv_type = 'Person' left join process.color_information pci on pci.name_code = pas.oper_status_cd__c and pci.type = 'OPERATING_STATUS' and pci.lang_id__c = 'PTB' where pas.serialnumber = #{serialNumber}
select pcp.row_id as campaignId , pcp.type__c as type , pcp.name as campaignName from process.campaign pcp where pcp.name = #{campaignName}

select pam.integration_id as integrationId , pam.asset_id as assetId , pas.serialnumber , (select dealercode__c from process.account where row_id = pam.dealer_id) as dealerCustomerSap , pam.research_date as date , pam.status as status , pam.research_name as description , pam.sra_sr_id as spId , pas.serialnumber as srNumber from process.amaro pam left join process.asset pas on pam.asset_id = pas.row_id where pas.serialnumber = #{serialNumber}
